alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 2:25AM CDT until June 26 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM CDT FOR MOBILE AND CENTRAL BALDWIN COUNTIES... At 224 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Stockton to 6 miles east of Satsuma to I10 And I65 to 5 miles northwest of Grand Bay, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Tillmans Corner, Fairhope, Saraland, Bay Minette, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Grand Bay, Robertsdale, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Point Clear, Dauphin Island, Loxley and Chunchula. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
